DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate whether difference recovery time return normal activity follow laparoscopic supracervical hysterectomy ( LSH ) compare total laparoscopic hysterectomy ( TLH ) . Both type hysterectomy commonly perform institution . Patients assign chance ( like coin toss ) either LSH TLH . Preoperatively , participant complete quality life questionnaire ( SF-36 ) , sexual function questionnaire ( FSFI ) 3 question questionnaire urinary function ( 3IQ ) . Following surgery participant ask keep diary pain symptom use narcotic . The diary fill daily patient resume normal activity prior surgery . The SF-36 complete 6 week follow original surgery . 6 month follow surgery participant receive copy SF-36 FSFI mail . They also ask question urinary symptom persistent vaginal bleeding .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Supracervical Hysterectomy Versus Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Candidates laparoscopic hysterectomy benign indication Malignancy uterus , cervix adnexa premalignant change uterus , cervix adnexa history severe cervical dysplasia ( CIN II )
